normalized: i had planned to ambush her and finish her off in an instant.
it was unfortunate that i wouldn't be able to appreciate the astonished face of the director for too long.

name: gram
normalized: kukukuku
i restored my original appearance, by transforming back from yamakawa to myself.
it was much easier for me to use my abilities in it.

name: gram
normalized: you bastard.
i am going to transform you into my slave immediately, barrier-master.
i opened the door, which had a spirit-barrier in the shape of a pentagram carved into it, and stepped inside boldly.

name: kitae
normalized: five dragon-seal barrier── haa!
i wasn't expecting it.
the roaring voice of the barrier-master echoed throughout the room.
immediately following which──
it seemed like the entire area had distorted.
and then, the very next moment,

name: gram
normalized: guooh!?
a crackling sound, like an electric short-circuit, echoed throughout the room.
and together with that, my body was struck by a shock, as if i had been struck by lightning.

name: gram
normalized: … whaat… …!?

name: kitae
normalized: the five dragon-seal, which i have conjured, is the strongest spirit-barrier in existence.
it is more than enough to turn an ordinary vampire, like you, to ashes.

name: gram
normalized: how… ridiculous!?
by the time i realized that i had touched her spirit-barrier, it was already too late.
my flesh was disintegrating and my bones were melting away, from the part of my body with which i had touched it.
very soon, the entire right-half of my body had completely burned away.

name: gram
normalized: w-why… …!?
w-why did you conjure the spirit-barrier… despite the time!?
she had countered me, as if she was completely aware of my ambush and had been expecting it.

name: kitae
normalized: this is my room after all.
had the barrier-master just said… that this was her room!?
most of my body had turned to ashes by now.

name: kitae
normalized: this is the room of the barrier-master.
it is impossible for a vampire, like you, to fight against me in my territory and emerge victorious.

name: kitae
normalized: you are similar to a lost little animal, which has been ensnared without it even knowing about it.
you were trapped within my cage, the moment you stepped foot in here.

name: gram
normalized: y-you… bas… taard!

name: kitae
normalized: i wanted to ask you so much more, however, i guess it can't be helped.
by now, it was just my face which was left.

name: kitae
normalized: as my parting gift, carry with you to the underworld this demonstration of the true power of the barrier-master, and begone!

name: gram
normalized: … damn… it… …
by the time i heard uehara kitae's words──
my newly-acquired body had been completely obliterated.
